name: fgo-calc
description: Calculate damage, NP charge, stars dropped, etc for multiple configurations of servants or enemies, for the game Fate/Grand Order

scripts.link: npm run build && cd dist && npm link
scripts.postpublish: git add . && git commit -m "Bump fgo-calc version" && cd ../archimedes && npm update fgo-calc --save && cd ../.. && npm update fgo-calc --save && git add . && git commit -m "Update deps" && git push

author: boyonthebeach2k <boyonthebeach2k@gmail.com>
